newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - First Tenn. cut on price.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - First Tenn. cut on price.

text.p: -- Salomon Brothers said it lowered its rating on First Tennessee National Corp to hold from buy because the shares have neared the firm's price target of 35 per share.
-- Said fundamental view of company remains unchanged.
-- Views a modest share repurchase plan by First Tennessee as likely. Said an aggressive plan could prompt earnings per share estimate increase, but said did not expect such a plan.
-- Said the rest of 1996 could be a challenging period for the company due to weakness in bond division.
